CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "Fix Price") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPC") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPO") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPA") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "Rev Share"),ROUND(Amount_Net_Net_Net__c / Quantity ,2), ROUND(Amount_Net_Net_Net__c / (Quantity/1000) ,2))
CustomField.label: CPM net/net/net
